---
title: "ASM Exam Sol Problem 5: Contrasts"
output: html_notebook
---


Use the data from problem 2 and take only methane and breed


```{r}
s_data_url_root <- "https://charlotte-ngs.github.io/asmss2023/data"
s_data_url_p2 <- file.path(s_data_url_root, "asm_exam_p02.csv")
tbl_p2 <- readr::read_delim(file = s_data_url_p2, delim = ",")
tbl_p2
```

Cut the column of acetone

```{r}
library(dplyr)
tbl_p5 <- tbl_p2 |>
  select(-Acetone)
tbl_p5
```

Arrange according to breed and re-number

```{r}
tbl_p5 <- tbl_p5 |>
  arrange(Breed)
tbl_p5$Cow <- 1:nrow(tbl_p5)
tbl_p5
```

Write the data to a file

```{r}
s_p05_path <- file.path(here::here(), "docs", "data", "asm_exam_p05.csv")
readr::write_delim(tbl_p5, file = s_p05_path, delim = ",")
```
